info.title: OnConnect Data Delivery APIs
info.description: Test our Gracenote API services using API Explorer. Simply enter the parameters and click “Try It”. You must have a valid API key for this to work (if you do not already have one, Get Started to read more about plans and request a key). OnConnect v1.1 APIs are active and available! All endpoints below are now v1.1. For more information on version migration, see Migration FAQ.

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

get.summary: Returns a list of all movies currently playing in ...
get.description: Returns a list of all movies currently playing in local theatres, with showtimes.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date (yyyy-mm-dd). Schedules available starting with current day.

parameters.name: numDays
parameters.description: Number of schedule days. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: US zip code or Canadian postal code. Must supply either zip or coordinates.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude coordinate. Valid values are between -90 and 90. Must supply either zip or coordinates.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Longitude coordinate. Valid values are between -180 and 180. Must supply either zip or coordinates.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Range to search from initial location. Defaults to 5 miles. Maximum 100 mi (160 km).

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Unit of measurement for the radius parameter as well as the distance value in response.  Defaults to miles.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

get.summary: Returns all shows and episodes and associated meta...
get.description: Returns all shows and episodes and associated metadata airing new (or live) on a lineup for a given time period up to 24 hours in length and up to 14 days in advance.

parameters.name: lineupId
parameters.description: Lineup ID

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to start from (ISO 8601).

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to end on (ISO 8601). Defaults to startDateTime plus three hours.

parameters.name: includeAdult
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether to include adult TV shows in response. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageAspectTV
parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. Only applies to TV content. The default value is 2x3.

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

get.summary: Returns live sports events and associated metadata...
get.description: Returns live sports events and associated metadata for a list of sports that are airing on a lineup for a given time period up to 24 hours in length and up to 14 days in advance.

parameters.name: sportsId
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of sports genre ids (e.g., 58 for baseball, 59 for basketball) or 'all' to return airings for all sports.

parameters.name: lineupId
parameters.description: Lineup ID

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to start from (ISO 8601).

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to end on (ISO 8601). Defaults to startDateTime plus three hours.

parameters.name: liveOnly
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether to only include live events. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageAspectTV
parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. Only applies to TV content. The default value is 2x3.

get.summary: Returns movies and associated metadata that are ai...
get.description: Returns movies and associated metadata that are airing on a lineup for a given time period up to 24 hours in length and up to 14 days in advance.

parameters.name: lineupId
parameters.description: Lineup ID

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to start from (ISO 8601).

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to end on (ISO 8601). Defaults to startDateTime plus three hours.

parameters.name: includeAdult
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether to include adult TV shows in response. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

parameters.name: descriptionLang
parameters.description: Optional filter based on specified description language. If not specified, all movies airings returned.

get.summary: Returns a list of lineups for a country and postal...
get.description: Returns a list of lineups for a country and postal code.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code. See here for list of countries currently available.  If not specified, defaults to USA.

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.description: Postal Code. See International Lineups for more information.

get.summary: Returns details for a given lineup.

parameters.name: lineupId
parameters.description: Lineup ID

get.summary: Returns a list of stations and channel positions a...
get.description: Returns a list of stations and channel positions associated with the lineup provided.

parameters.name: lineupId
parameters.description: Lineup ID

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: enhancedCallSign
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether or not to include display-friendly call signs in the results. Defaults to false.

get.summary: Returns schedule airing and associated program met...
get.description: Returns schedule airing and associated program metadata for a lineup to be contained within a TV grid. Allows for up to 6 hours of schedule metadata for a given date up to 14 days in advance.

parameters.name: lineupId
parameters.description: Lineup ID

parameters.name: stationId
parameters.description: Station ID. Multiple stations accepted, comma-separated.

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to start from (ISO 8601)

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to end on (ISO 8601). Defaults to startDateTime plus three hours.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Amount of program metadata to be returned in TV grid. The default value is Detailed. For smaller response size, use Basic or DetailedNoImage.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageAspectTV
parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. Only applies to TV content. The default value is 2x3.

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

parameters.name: excludeChannels
parameters.description: Optional comma-delimited list of channel types to exclude from grid. Valid values are: nonhd, music, ppv, adult, premium.

parameters.name: enhancedCallSign
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether or not to include display-friendly call signs in the results. Defaults to false.

get.summary: Returns details for a single station. *Available w...
get.description: Returns details for a single station. *Available with R&D/Commercial plans only.

parameters.name: stationId
parameters.description: Station ID

parameters.name: lineupId
parameters.description: Lineup ID. If not provided, channel numbers will not be included in the response.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium). Only small and medium logos available for stations.

get.summary: Returns airings schedule and associated program me...
get.description: Returns airings schedule and associated program metadata for a single station for a given time period over the next 14 days.

parameters.name: stationId
parameters.description: Station ID

parameters.name: lineupId
parameters.description: Lineup ID. If not provided, channel numbers will not be included in the response.

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to start from (ISO 8601).

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to end on (ISO 8601). Defaults to startDateTime plus three hours.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageAspectTV
parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. Only applies to TV content. The default value is 2x3.

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

get.summary: Returns basic program metatdata based on free-form...
get.description: Returns basic program metatdata based on free-form search criteria.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query string.

parameters.name: queryFields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields in which the search string is queried against. Valid fields are title, description, cast, genres, and directors. Do not include spaces in list.

parameters.name: entityType
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of program types to search. Valid values are movie, episode, sports, show. Do not include spaces in list.

parameters.name: genres
parameters.description: Filter results by the specified comma-separated list of genres. See Program Genres method for available genres.

parameters.name: includeAdult
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether to include programs with 'Adults Only' genre in response. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: titleLang
parameters.description: Filter results based on the specified title language (e.g., en=English, es=Spanish, en-GB=British English, pt-BR=Brazilian Portugese)

parameters.name: descriptionLang
parameters.description: Filter results based on the specified description language, using IETF language tags.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to be returned from the query. Valid values are between 1 and 50. Default is 10.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset index on the result set. Used in conjunction with limit to page through results. For example, offset=10 will set response data to begin with 11th hit.

parameters.name: lineupId
parameters.description: Lineup ID. If specified, response will include only programs found in the schedule and list their airings under each program summary. If not specified, all programs matching the query will be returned, and no airings will be listed.

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to start from (ISO 8601). Defaults to start of current hour. Only used when lineupId is specified. Example: 2013-03-05T22:00Z

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to end on (ISO 8601). If not specified, airings will be shown chronologically from the startDateTime, up to the maximum of 50 per program. Only used when lineupId is specified.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageAspectTV
parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. Only applies to TV content. The default value is 2x3.

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

get.summary: Returns detailed metadata for any TMS program ID (...
get.description: Returns detailed metadata for any TMS program ID (Movie, Show, Episode, or Sports).

parameters.name: tmsId
parameters.description: TMS ID

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageAspectTV
parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. Only applies to TV content. The default value is 2x3.

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

get.summary: Returns all airings of a specific program for a gi...
get.description: Returns all airings of a specific program for a given lineup and time period up to 14 days in advance.

parameters.name: tmsId
parameters.description: TMS ID

parameters.name: lineupId
parameters.description: Lineup ID

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to start from (ISO 8601).

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to end on (ISO 8601). Defaults to startDateTime plus three hours.

parameters.name: includeDetail
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether to include detailed program metadata with each airing. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageAspectTV
parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. Only applies to TV content. The default value is 2x3.

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

get.summary: Returns all shows and episodes and associated meta...
get.description: Returns all shows and episodes and associated metadata that aired new (or live) for given past dates up to 7 days. *Available with R&D/Commercial plans only.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Date to start (yyyy-mm-dd).

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Date to end (yyyy-mm-dd). Defaults to startDate.

parameters.name: includeAdult
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether to include adult TV shows in response. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageAspectTV
parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. Only applies to TV content. The default value is 2x3.

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

get.summary: Returns a list of notable TV programming and assoc...
get.description: Returns a list of notable TV programming and associated metadata due to air at future date. *Available with R&D/Commercial plans only.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Date to start (yyyy-mm-dd).

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Date to end (yyyy-mm-dd). Defaults to 31 days after startDate.

parameters.name: eventCode
parameters.description: Comma-separated list corresponding to selected event type codes. Default will return all types.

parameters.name: titleLang
parameters.description: Filter results based on the specified title language (e.g., en=English, es=Spanish, en-GB=British English, pt-BR=Brazilian Portugese)

parameters.name: descriptionLang
parameters.description: Preference for description language to be returned. If specified descriptionLang not found for series, reverts to primary TMS ID for series.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the images to be returned. If not specified, images in all available sizes will be returned.

parameters.name: imageAspectTV
parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the images to be returned. Only applies to TV content. If not specified, images in all available aspect ratios will be returned.

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

get.summary: Returns all available images associated with a pro...
get.description: Returns all available images associated with a program. *Available with R&D/Commercial plans only.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: tmsId or rootId for program

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: If specified, only images in selected size will be included. Default will return all available image sizes.

parameters.name: imageAspectTV
parameters.description: If specified, only images in selected aspect ratio will be included. Only applies to TV content. Default will return images in all available aspect ratios.

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating filter for image types with or without text. If not specified, will return all image types.

get.summary: Returns a list of program genres, to be used in co...
get.description: Returns a list of program genres, to be used in conjunction with Program Search. Note: language parameter deprecated in v1.1.

get.summary: Returns detailed metadata for a given series.

parameters.name: seriesId
parameters.description: Series ID

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageAspectTV
parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. Only applies to TV content. The default value is 2x3.

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

parameters.name: titleLang
parameters.description: Filter results based on the specified title language (e.g., en=English, es=Spanish, en-GB=British English, pt-BR=Brazilian Portugese)

parameters.name: descriptionLang
parameters.description: Preference for description language to be returned. If specified descriptionLang not found for series, reverts to primary TMS ID for series.

get.summary: Returns all airings of a series for a given lineup...
get.description: Returns all airings of a series for a given lineup and time period up to 14 days in advance.

parameters.name: seriesId
parameters.description: Series ID

parameters.name: lineupId
parameters.description: Lineup ID

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to start from (ISO 8601).

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to end on (ISO 8601). Defaults to startDateTime plus three hours.

parameters.name: includeDetail
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether to include detailed program metadata with each airing. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageAspectTV
parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. Only applies to TV content. The default value is 2x3.

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

parameters.name: descriptionLang
parameters.description: Optional filter based on specified description language. If not specified, all series airings returned.

get.summary: Returns episodes of a series, sorted by season and...
get.description: Returns episodes of a series, sorted by season and episode numbers. If limit/offset parameters not provided, will return up to maximum of 100 episodes. If limit/offset parameters provided, response will be wrapped in object with hitCount (total number of episodes) for paging.

parameters.name: seriesId
parameters.description: Series ID

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Season number. If not specified, will return episodes from all seasons.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Amount of program metadata to be returned for episodes. The default value is Detailed. For smaller response size, use Basic.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to be returned from the query. Default is 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset index on the result set. Used in conjunction with limit to page through results. For example, offset=10 will set response data to begin with 11th hit.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageAspectTV
parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. Only applies to TV content. The default value is 2x3.

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

parameters.name: titleLang
parameters.description: Filter results based on the specified title language (e.g., en=English, es=Spanish, en-GB=British English, pt-BR=Brazilian Portugese)

parameters.name: descriptionLang
parameters.description: Set preference for description language to be returned. If specified descriptionLang not found for episode, reverts to primary TMS ID for episode.

get.summary: Returns all versions of a given movie. *Available ...
get.description: Returns all versions of a given movie. *Available with R&D/Commercial plans only.

parameters.name: rootId
parameters.description: Movie Root ID

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

parameters.name: descriptionLang
parameters.description: Filter results based on the specified description language. When not specified, returns English versions, or if no English descriptions available, returns versions with descriptionLang of primary TMS ID.

get.summary: Returns all airings of a movie for a given lineup ...
get.description: Returns all airings of a movie for a given lineup and time period up to 14 days in advance.

parameters.name: rootId
parameters.description: Movie Root ID

parameters.name: lineupId
parameters.description: Lineup ID

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to start from (ISO 8601).

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to end on (ISO 8601). Defaults to startDateTime plus three hours.

parameters.name: includeDetail
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether to include detailed movie metadata with each airing. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

parameters.name: descriptionLang
parameters.description: Optional filter based on specified description language. If not specified, all airings of movie returned.

get.summary: Returns a list of theatres for a given zip/postal ...
get.description: Returns a list of theatres for a given zip/postal code or coordinates.

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: US zip code or Canadian postal code. Must supply either zip or coordinates.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude coordinate. Valid values are between -90 and 90. Must supply either zip or coordinates.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Longitude coordinate. Valid values are between -180 and 180. Must supply either zip or coordinates.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Range to search from initial location. Defaults to 5 miles. Maximum 100 mi (160 km).

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Unit of measurement for the radius parameter as well as the distance value in response.  Defaults to miles.

parameters.name: numTheatres
parameters.description: Maximum number of theatres to return. If not specified, response will include max 100 theatres within specified radius.

get.summary: Returns details for a specified theatre. *Availabl...
get.description: Returns details for a specified theatre. *Available with R&D/Commercial plans only.

parameters.name: theatreId
parameters.description: Theatre ID.

get.summary: Returns a list of all movies and showtimes at a th...
get.description: Returns a list of all movies and showtimes at a theatre for a given day(s).

parameters.name: theatreId
parameters.description: Theatre ID.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date (yyyy-mm-dd). Schedules available starting with current day.

parameters.name: numDays
parameters.description: Number of schedule days. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

get.summary: Returns movie metadata and theatre/showtimes infor...
get.description: Returns movie metadata and theatre/showtimes information for a specified movie.

parameters.name: movieId
parameters.description: tmsId or rootId.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date (yyyy-mm-dd). Schedules available starting with current day.

parameters.name: numDays
parameters.description: Number of schedule days. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: US zip code or Canadian postal code. Must supply either zip or coordinates.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude coordinate. Valid values are between -90 and 90. Must supply either zip or coordinates.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Longitude coordinate. Valid values are between -180 and 180. Must supply either zip or coordinates.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Range to search from initial location. Defaults to 5 miles. Maximum 100 mi (160 km).

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Unit of measurement for the radius parameter as well as the distance value in response.  Defaults to miles.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

get.summary: Returns a list of movies and associated metadata b...
get.description: Returns a list of movies and associated metadata being released on a given date provided and up to 6 months into the future. *Available with R&D/Commercial plans only.

parameters.name: releaseDate
parameters.description: Start date (yyyy-mm-dd). Can be up to 7 days prior to current date.

parameters.name: numDays
parameters.description: Number of days to search. Defaults to 60. Maximum 180.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Returns releases for specified country (USA or CAN). Defaults to USA.

parameters.name: titleLang
parameters.description: Filter results based on the specified title language (e.g., en=English). If not specified, defaults to en.

parameters.name: descriptionLang
parameters.description: Filter results based on the specified description language (e.g., es=Spanish). If not specified, defaults to en.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

parameters.name: imageText
parameters.description: Boolean indicating preference for image with or without text. If no image is found matching text preference, next available image will be returned. Defaults to true (prefer images with text).

get.summary: Returns movie trailer metadata for one or more ass...
get.description: Returns movie trailer metadata for one or more assets, with option for embeddable player links. A ScreenPlay customer agreement is required for production use.

parameters.name: rootids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of movie rootIds.

parameters.name: bitrateids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of one or more encode bitrates. If omitted, all encode bitrates available per customer agreement will be returned.

parameters.name: trailersonly
parameters.description: Filter by video asset type. 0 (default) returns trailers and extras. 1 returns trailers only.

parameters.name: languageid
parameters.description: Return trailers in specified language only. Defaults to English. See documentation for Screenplay language codes.

parameters.name: player_url
parameters.description: 0 (default) returns bounce links, which require developer to supply appropriate player for format. 1 returns embeddable player links.

parameters.name: best_eclip
parameters.description: 0 (default) returns all video assets for each rootId. 1 returns most recent trailer asset.

get.summary: This API provides subscribers access to all Intern...
get.description: This API provides subscribers access to all Internet Video Archive,(IVA), trailers with direct links and various embed options. The API is is fully customizable using unlimited Application Profiles that are managed through IVA's CMS Media Manager.

parameters.name: programid
parameters.description: Program ID or Title: In order to find a trailer for a movie, game or tv show the API needs to know what you are searching for. This is best done using ID's. If you don't have access to any ID's, Entertainment Express also supports a Title Search option where you can search for titles. The API will return a list of matches ordered by relevance for you to display to your users or automatically select the first one to display on your application.

parameters.name: idtype
parameters.description: idtype is required for id search. 1 is the internal IVA ID, 11 indicates TMSid and 80 indicates rootId.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: This is used to customize the response from the API. By using an Application Profile, you can specify the media types, target audience, language preferences, and a host of other options.

parameters.name: customerid
parameters.description: This filed is required and identifies your account

get.summary: This API provides subscribers access to all Intern...
get.description: This API provides subscribers access to all Internet Video Archive,(IVA), trailers with direct links and various embed options. The API is is fully customizable using unlimited Application Profiles that are managed through IVA's CMS Media Manager.

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Term is required for title searches.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: This is used to customize the response from the API. By using an Application Profile, you can specify the media types, target audience, language preferences, and a host of other options.

parameters.name: customerid
parameters.description: This filed is required and identifies your account

get.summary: Returns all (or specified) sports with associated ...
get.description: Returns all (or specified) sports with associated organizations.

parameters.name: sportsId
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of sports genre ids (e.g., "59" for Basketball) or 'all' for all sports.

parameters.name: includeOrg
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether to include organization metadata. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Size of the image referenced by the preferred image URI returned. The default value is Md (medium)

get.summary: Returns sports non-events (talk shows) and taped e...
get.description: Returns sports non-events (talk shows) and taped events (classic games, early morning replays, etc.) for a list of sports that are airing on a lineup for a given time period up to 24 hours in length and up to 14 days in advance.

parameters.name: sportsId
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of sports genre ids (e.g., 58 for baseball, 59 for basketball) or 'all' to return airings for all sports.

parameters.name: lineupId
parameters.description: Lineup ID

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Date/Time to start from (ISO 8601).

parameters.name: endDateTime
